title: Scandinavian Airlines CEO: AI can cut disruption response times
description: The airline’s chief says artificial intelligence will help rebuild schedules during storms and improve efficiency in an industry that faces constant uncertainty.
content:
As Europe’s aviation sector continues to consolidate and adapt to new technologies, Scandinavian Airlines is positioning itself for a new phase of growth — while waiting for regulators to give the green light to its next big step.

title: 'Use AI To Learn, Not To Waste Time': PM Modi’s Advice To Students At Pariksha Pe Charcha 2026
description: During Pariksha Pe Charcha, Prime Minister Narendra Modi spoke on the responsible use of artificial intelligence, advising students to treat AI as a learning aid rather than a shortcut. He said the right questions can turn AI into a partner that builds curiosity, clarity and independent thinking.
content: Pariksha Pe Charcha 2026: Artificial Intelligence was the central topic of the most recent edition of Pariksha Pe Charcha, with Prime Minister Modi guiding the students to utilise emerging technology not only judiciously but also with a purpose. In a... [1798 chars]

description: Artificial intelligence is no longer just about breakthroughs in labs or pumping billions of dollars into data centres — it’s in our hospitals, courtrooms, classrooms, and on the battlefield.

title: Tech giants hit back as AI fears wipe $9b off ASX in five days

title: Karnataka to deploy Rs 67-crore AI tool to monitor social media, fight fake news
description: The Karnataka government has sanctioned an Artificial Intelligence-based platform to monitor online content and address digital threats, aiming to enhance public order and digital governance.

title: Beyond the Hype: AI's Collective Intelligence Dilemma
description: The claim that artificial intelligence will soon surpass human intelligence is flawed. AI lacks the social, embodied, and collective dimensions that define human intelligence. While AI excels in narrow tasks, it cannot replicate the diversity, cooperation, and cultural understanding foundational to human cognition.
content: Melbourne, Feb 6 (The Conversation) – The notion that artificial intelligence might soon surpass human intelligence has gained considerable traction. Yet, experts argue that such claims overlook the essential social, embodied, and collective nature o... [658 chars]
